senses.de: Related to specialized skills or knowledge in a particular field
senses.ex: She has excellent technical skills in computer programming.

Tips.title: Field Specific
Tips.description: Remember 'technical' implies profound understanding within a profession.
Tips.example: Her technical knowledge of engineering was impressive.

Tips.title: Skill Proficiency
Tips.description: Use 'technical' when discussing someone's adeptness in specialized tasks.
Tips.example: He's highly regarded for his technical prowess as a pilot.

senses.de: Related to the details of how something is done
senses.ex: Please follow the technical guidelines mentioned in the manual.

Tips.title: Detail Oriented
Tips.description: 'Technical' often describes intricate parts of a process or object.
Tips.example: The technician addressed the technical aspects of the repair.

Tips.title: Beyond Basics
Tips.description: Distinguishes advanced guidelines from basic instructions.
Tips.example: Follow the technical procedures to configure the server.

senses.de: Used in a specific industry or profession
senses.ex: The document contains too much technical jargon that a layman can't understand.

Tips.title: Profession Oriented
Tips.description: 'Technical' can signal industry-specific words not known by all.

Tips.title: Jargon Alert
Tips.description: Signals language use for professionals, not general public.
Tips.example: She found the technical language in the article difficult.

senses.de: Involving only an exact understanding of facts or principles related to a specific subject
senses.ex: The teacher gave a technical explanation about the scientific theory.

Tips.title: Academic Context
Tips.description: In studies, 'technical' conveys precise knowledge in subjects.
Tips.example: His technical insight into molecular biology is vast.

Tips.title: Precise Explanation
Tips.description: Use when describing an explanation that involves exactness.
Tips.example: The lecture included a technical breakdown of the experiment.

senses.ex: Technical training is necessary for this job position.

Tips.title: Practical Application
Tips.description: Can refer to hands-on skills rather than theory.
Tips.example: The job required technical competence in woodworking.

Tips.title: Technique Focus
Tips.description: Concerns the methods or ways of doing specific tasks.
Tips.example: Technical ability is crucial for a graphic designer.

Analytic.wordDefinition:
Analytic refers to the ability to analyze or break down a problem into smaller parts and examine them closely.

Analytic is about understanding and breaking down a problem while technical is about using specialized skills and knowledge to solve a problem practically.

Complex.wordDefinition:
Complex refers to something that is difficult to understand or involves many parts that are not simple. For example, an intricate puzzle can be complex, as it has many different pieces that must be put together.

Complex can describe anything that is complicated, whether it involves technology or not.

Engineer.wordDefinition:
Engineer is a profession where a person uses their knowledge of mathematics and science to solve technical problems and design solutions.

Both words can be used in a variety of fields, but engineer usually refers to someone who has completed specific schooling and has professional certification, while technical can refer to someone with practical experience in a particular field.

In short, engineers design and create solutions to complex problems while technical experts implement and maintain those solutions.

Intricate.wordDefinition:
Intricate means something that has a lot of small and complicated parts that fit together in a complex way.

Intricate refers to complexity in design, while technical refers to complexity in application or function.

Mechanical.wordDefinition:
Mechanical refers to anything related to machines or the way things move, while technical refers to any complex or specific knowledge or skill required for a particular job or task.

Mechanical can be used in the context of a car engine, for example, while technical can describe the knowledge required to operate the engine properly.

Mechanical is typically more hands-on, while technical is more theoretical or abstract.

Scientific.wordDefinition:
Scientific refers to the study of natural phenomena through experimentation and observation, while technical refers to practical skills and applications in a particular field.

Scientific research is used to develop new knowledge and theories, while technical skills are used to design, build, and maintain technology and systems.

Scientific concepts are applicable in fields like physics, chemistry, and biology, while technical skills are needed in fields like engineering, computer science, and medicine.

Specialize.wordDefinition:
Specialize means to focus on a specific area or skill, such as becoming an expert in a particular field like medicine or law.

Technical refers to things that involve technology or specialized knowledge, such as a technical document, technical support, or technical skills like coding or engineering.

Technical can also refer to something that is specific or difficult to understand without specialized knowledge.

So, in simple terms, specialize is about mastering a specific skill or area, while technical refers to things that involve specialized knowledge, technology, or specific details.

Both words can be used in a variety of contexts, but specialize tends to be more focused on individual skills, while technical can relate to a range of specialized fields.

Technology.wordDefinition:
Technical refers to anything that involves specific knowledge or skills required to perform a task.

It is generally used to describe tasks or jobs that involve a high level of expertise or specialization. For example, a technical writer creates highly specialized instruction manuals or documentation for products.

Technology refers to the tools and methods used to accomplish a task.

It can involve software, hardware, and other tools used to get something done. For example, a computer is a technology used to perform many different tasks.

In other words, technical describes something that requires specialized knowledge or expertise to perform, while technology describes the tools or methods that someone might use to accomplish that task.

quotes.Text: I never took any guitar lessons or anything; I never really learned to play covers. I'm actually happy that I never took lessons as a kid. Now, I'd like to take lessons to kind of go deeper. But I think sometimes lessons can steal a person's personality away, because they're trying to do things so technically.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: King Tuff

quotes.Text: Before discovering theater, I was sloughing off and didn't have any passion for school. Then I couldn't get enough. All of a sudden, I was getting good parts in all of these plays. I just loved it. I started getting A's in acting, directing and technical theater. I found something that clicked.
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: Gary Sinise

quotes.Text: Because technically actors are just public servants really. They just tell stories because people need to be told stories. That's all it is. And yet we get treated as though we're important.
quotes.Title: Scottish Actor
quotes.Name: James McAvoy

quotes.Text: Great players are very good technically, but they also have a huge amount of character because, without it, you will never get to see that great technique because it vanishes under pressure.

quotes.Name: Javier Mascherano

quotes.Text: I was brought up by my mother and my two sisters, although they're older than me and fled the nest very young, so I was technically raised as an only child, but I was very much loved.
quotes.Title: English Actor
quotes.Name: Gary Oldman

quotes.Text: I think I've spent so much time playing characters that are so far away from me and learning how to technically build and how to technically put something on top of you.
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: Josh Lucas

quotes.Text: I personally make sure that my songs are all original without any technical help, and only when that happens that I get complete satisfaction as a singer.

quotes.Name: Javed Ali

quotes.Text: Manny Pacquiao's just not a technical guy. He's a world class fighter and that's what always makes him one of the fan's favorites.

quotes.Name: Keith Thurman

quotes.Text: I don't like to come at my character from some really technical place.
quotes.Title: Australian Actor
quotes.Name: Eric Bana

quotes.Text: Technically, Neymar is the best player in the world.
quotes.Name: Cafu
